metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Bash Tutorial
Learn Bash
Bash is used to write scripts and run commands on Linux systems.
content.html: Bash is used to write scripts and run commands on Linux systems.

content.text: It helps automate tasks, manage system operations, and boost productivity.
content.html: It helps automate tasks, manage system operations, and boost productivity.

content.text: Understanding Shells
A shell is a text-based interface that lets you talk to your computer.
content.html: A shell is a text-based interface that lets you talk to your computer.

content.text: There are different types of shells, but Bash (Bourne Again SHell) is the most popular because it's powerful and easy to use.
content.html: There are different types of shells, but Bash (Bourne Again SHell) is the most popular because it's powerful and easy to use.

content.text: Types of Shells:
Why Use Bash?
Learning by Examples
In this tutorial, we will show you Bash commands like this:
content.html: In this tutorial, we will show you Bash commands like this:

content.code:
bash
--version
GNU bash, version 5.2.21(1)-release (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu)
Copyright (C) 2022 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later

This is free software; you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.
content.code_html:
bash --version
GNU bash, version 5.2.21(1)-release (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu)
Copyright (C) 2022 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later

This is free software; you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.

content.text: For new users, using the terminal view can seem a bit complicated.
content.html: For new users, using the terminal view can seem a bit complicated.

content.text: Don't worry! We will keep it really simple, and learning this way gives you a good grasp of how Bash works.
content.html: Don't worry! We will keep it really simple, and learning this way gives you a good grasp of how Bash works.

content.text: In the code above, you can see commands (input) and output.
content.html: In the code above, you can see commands (input) and output.

content.text: Lines like this are commands we input:
content.html: Lines like this are commands we input:

content.code_html: bash --version

content.text: Lines like this are the output/response to our commands:
content.html: Lines like this are the output/response to our commands:

content.code:
GNU bash, version 5.2.21(1)-release (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu)
Copyright (C) 2022 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later

This is free software; you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.
content.code_html:
GNU bash, version 5.2.21(1)-release (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu)
Copyright (C) 2022 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later

This is free software; you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.

content.text: In general, lines with $ in front of it is input. These are the commands you can copy and run in your terminal.
content.html: In general, lines with $ in front of it is input. These are the commands you can copy and run in your terminal.

content.text: Bash Exercises
Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.
content.html: Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
See all Bash Exercises
content.html: See all Bash Exercises

content.text: Bash Quiz
Learn by taking a quiz! The quiz will give you a signal of how much you know about Bash.
content.html: Learn by taking a quiz! The quiz will give you a signal of how much you know about Bash.
